BoxLocalization.Label: Data matrix
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines data matrix and its parameters

Action.Name: TestPrimaryKeyColumns
Action.Label: Test primary key
Action.Hint: This will test enered primary key for duplicit values.

Socket.Name: Database
Socket.Label: Database
Socket.Hint: Defines data source for the data matrix

Socket.Name: Name
Socket.Label: Name
Socket.Hint: Name of the table. The name will enclosed in aphostrophes in SQL query.

Socket.Name: PrimaryKeyColumns
Socket.Label: Primary key
Socket.Hint: List of columns that define the primary key of the table. The value is either a value of one column or CSV (comma separated values). It will be not enclosed in apostrophes.

Socket.Name: RecordCount
Socket.Label: Records count
Socket.Hint: Number of rows in the table (pre-computed field).

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: DerivedColumn
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Derived column
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box of a new defived column

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: Column
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Column @Name
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box corresponding to the column @Name

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AllColumns
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: All columns in data matrix
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates boxes for all columns inthis datamatrix.

Phrase.PhraseText: No duplicates found in the specified primary key.
Duplicit values found in the specified primary key!
